wesm commented on a change in pull request #7277:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7277#discussion_r430823705



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc
##########
@@ -352,7 +352,7 @@ class DoExchangeMessageWriter : public FlightMessageWriter {
   }
 
   grpc::ServerReaderWriter<pb::FlightData, pb::FlightData>* stream_;
-  ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;
+  ::arrow::ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;

Review comment:
       This needs to also be IpcWriteOptions. Try building with `-DARROW_NO_DEPRECATED_API=ON`

kiszk commented on a change in pull request #7277:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7277#discussion_r430854143



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc
##########
@@ -352,7 +352,7 @@ class DoExchangeMessageWriter : public FlightMessageWriter {
   }
 
   grpc::ServerReaderWriter<pb::FlightData, pb::FlightData>* stream_;
-  ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;
+  ::arrow::ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;

Review comment:
       on s390x with `-DARROW_NOW_DEPRECATED_API=ON` and w/o this PR cause the following build error
   ```
   [ 60%] Building CXX object src/arrow/flight/CMakeFiles/arrow_flight_objlib.dir/server.cc.o
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:355:8: error: 'IpcOptions' in namespace 'arrow::ipc' does not name a type
      ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;
           ^~~~~~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc: In constructor 'arrow::flight::{anonymous}::DoExchangeMessageWriter::DoExchangeMessageWriter(grpc::ServerReaderWriter<arrow::flight::protocol::FlightData, arrow::flight::protocol::FlightData>*)':
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:281:26: error: class 'arrow::flight::{anonymous}::DoExchangeMessageWriter' does not have any field named 'ipc_options_'
          : stream_(stream), ipc_options_(ipc::IpcOptions::Defaults()) {}
                             ^~~~~~~~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:281:44: error: 'arrow::ipc::IpcOptions' has not been declared
          : stream_(stream), ipc_options_(ipc::IpcOptions::Defaults()) {}
                                               ^~~~~~~~~~
   In file included from /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server_auth.h:25:0,
                    from /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.h:29,
                    from /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:21:
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc: In member function 'virtual arrow::Status arrow::flight::{anonymous}::DoExchangeMessageWriter::Begin(const std::shared_ptr<arrow::Schema>&)':
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:291:18: error: 'ipc_options_' was not declared in this scope
            *schema, ipc_options_, &dictionary_memo_, &schema_payload.ipc_message));
                     ^
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/status.h:57:62: note: in definition of macro 'ARROW_RETURN_NOT_OK'
        ::arrow::Status __s = ::arrow::internal::GenericToStatus(status); \
                                                                 ^~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:290:5: note: in expansion of macro 'RETURN_NOT_OK'
        RETURN_NOT_OK(ipc::internal::GetSchemaPayload(
        ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc: In member function 'virtual arrow::Status arrow::flight::{anonymous}::DoExchangeMessageWriter::WriteWithMetadata(const arrow::RecordBatch&, std::shared_ptr<arrow::Buffer>)':
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:314:53: error: 'ipc_options_' was not declared in this scope
            ipc::internal::GetRecordBatchPayload(batch, ipc_options_, &payload.ipc_message));
                                                        ^
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/status.h:57:62: note: in definition of macro 'ARROW_RETURN_NOT_OK'
        ::arrow::Status __s = ::arrow::internal::GenericToStatus(status); \
                                                                 ^~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:313:5: note: in expansion of macro 'RETURN_NOT_OK'
        RETURN_NOT_OK(
        ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc: In member function 'arrow::Status arrow::flight::{anonymous}::DoExchangeMessageWriter::EnsureDictionariesWritten(const arrow::RecordBatch&)':
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:348:36: error: 'ipc_options_' was not declared in this scope
              pair.first, pair.second, ipc_options_, &payload.ipc_message));
                                       ^
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/status.h:57:62: note: in definition of macro 'ARROW_RETURN_NOT_OK'
        ::arrow::Status __s = ::arrow::internal::GenericToStatus(status); \
                                                                 ^~~~~~
   /home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-buildfailure/cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc:347:7: note: in expansion of macro 'RETURN_NOT_OK'
          RETURN_NOT_OK(ipc::internal::GetDictionaryPayload(
   ```

kiszk commented on a change in pull request #7277:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7277#discussion_r430857565



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc
##########
@@ -352,7 +352,7 @@ class DoExchangeMessageWriter : public FlightMessageWriter {
   }
 
   grpc::ServerReaderWriter<pb::FlightData, pb::FlightData>* stream_;
-  ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;
+  ::arrow::ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;

Review comment:
       How about `::arrow::ipc::IpcWriteOptions ipc_options_;`? It can succeed to compile arrow-flight.

kiszk commented on a change in pull request #7277:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7277#discussion_r430857565



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/server.cc
##########
@@ -352,7 +352,7 @@ class DoExchangeMessageWriter : public FlightMessageWriter {
   }
 
   grpc::ServerReaderWriter<pb::FlightData, pb::FlightData>* stream_;
-  ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;
+  ::arrow::ipc::IpcOptions ipc_options_;

Review comment:
       How about `::arrow::ipc::IpcWriteOptions ipc_options_;`? It can succeed to compile arrow-flight with and without `-DARROW_NO_DEPRECATED_API=ON`.

kiszk commented on pull request #7277:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7277#issuecomment-634737470


   Thanks, we still have build failure in another place at https://travis-ci.org/github/apache/arrow/jobs/691713153#L1015
   
   ```
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:391:50:   required from here
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:411:28: error: moving a local object in a return statement prevents copy elision [-Werror=pessimizing-move]
     411 |     return std::move(result);
         |                            ^
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:411:28: note: remove 'std::move' call
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc: In instantiation of 'arrow::Result<std::unique_ptr<arrow::ipc::Message> > arrow::flight::GrpcIpcMessageReader<Reader>::ReadNextMessage() [with Reader = grpc_impl::ClientReaderWriter<arrow::flight::protocol::FlightData, arrow::flight::protocol::FlightData>]':
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:391:50:   required from here
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:411:28: error: moving a local object in a return statement prevents copy elision [-Werror=pessimizing-move]
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/flight/client.cc:411:28: note: remove 'std::move' call
   cc1plus: all warnings being treated as errors
   ```
